tag_list: video, boulder, colorado, techstars, blipsnips, video-tagging
overview: Greg is LinkSmart’s Chief Operating Officer, managing the day to day operations, strategy and product execution. In this role, Greg will support the strategic objectives of the CEO and board with direct responsibility for recruiting and team development, product R & D oversight, sales and marketing management and pipeline development. Greg brings nearly two decades of team development, leadership and process implementation with a focus on product management, R & D and marketing ranging from start ups to large global organizations. He previously served as Vice President of Products for Lijit Networks ( a wholly-owned subsidiary of Federated Media Publishing), a Boulder-based company focused on social search and on-line advertising technologies and Vice President-Global Product Management for Embarcadero Technologies where he led product initiatives from its IPO to an eventual $200M acquisition in 2008. Most recently, Greg served as co-founder and Chief Product Officer of 2010 TechStars graduate, BlipSnips, a company focused on mobile video technology for brands and research organizations. Greg is a graduate of Syracuse University Maxwell School of Citizenship (B.A., International Relations and Foreign Languages)
